text: İrsen Küçük (1940 - 10 March 2019) was a Turkish Cypriot politician. He was the Prime Minister of Northern Cyprus from 2010 to 2013. He was the nephew of Republic of Cyprus's first Vice-President Dr Fazıl Küçük. Küçük died on 10 March 2019 in North Nicosia, Northern Cyprus from heart failure, aged 79. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Northern Cyprus
title: İrsen Küçük
